content: FX 3 Gas cartridge Compact, clean and portable lightweight gas cartridge for use with Hilti Stud Fusion tooling ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate portability – these pocket-size gas cartridges replace heavy and inconvenient full-size cylinders used for traditional stud welding Long-lasting supply – one gas cartridge is enough to weld approximately 100 studs Disposable steel cartridge – may be recyclable (facilities vary by location) Applications Welding gas (Argon-CO2 mixture) for Hilti Stud Fusion tooling only One gas cartridge lasts for approximately 100 threaded studs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Volume per unit: 0 gallon (US) Substances contained: ISO 14175 – M21 – ArC-18 Storage temperature - max.: 122 °F Technical Data | Product Type | Consumable | Volume per unit | 0 gal (US) | Substances contained | ISO 14175 – M21 – ArC-18 | Storage temperature - max. | 122 °F | Storage temperature - min. | -4 °F ### ITEMS- 2241926 - Gas can GC FX 3 - Package Size 1 pc
